FuncDef:
The accounting-scheme command configures the accounting scheme for the current service policy. The scheme must be a configured accounting scheme.
The undo accounting-scheme command restores the default accounting scheme of the service policy.
By default, the accounting scheme adopted by the service policy is default1.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the accounting scheme adopted by the service policy.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 characters and case insensitive. It should not contain slash (\), anti-slash (/), colon (:), asterisk (*), question mask (?), quotation mask ("), and angle brackets (< >).

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The accounting-scheme command is used to configure accounting schemes for value-added services.
Prerequisites
The value-added service policy template and the accounting scheme template have been configured before you use the accounting-scheme command.
Configuration Impact
If the accounting scheme template is imported to the value-added service policy template, the service is charged according to the accounting mode in the accounting scheme template.
